description:
Everyone needs to get data out of the RG from time to time. This tool does that for you and lets you work with that data elsewhere in your app. Want to total some elements form your RG?

Output up to 10 'columns' of data from your RG by placing one transmitter into the first cell!
name: Bubble Helper Toolkit
plugin_instructions:
Place the transmitter in a cell of your RG
place the receiver on the page

ensure the Extractor Name field matches in both elements

set the max length in both elements to be the :count for the RG you are extracting from

set your columns in the transmitter to be 1 field from the RG cell

set your receiver to be a matching data type


that should be it!
